FuncDef: This command configures the secondary DNS server for DNS name resolution. The secondary DNS server is used only if the primary DNS server does not respond.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP or IPv6 address of the secondary DNS server. Values-ipv4-address|a.b.c.d, ipv6-address|x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface], |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface], |x: [0 to FFFF]H, |d: [0 to 255]D, interface|32 chars max, for link local addresses.
